mapper.select: select count(1) from bbs_article_table where to_days(sendTime) = to_days(now());
mapper.update: update bbs_article_table set upvoteCount = upvoteCount + #{i} where articleId = #{articleid}
update bbs_article_table set replyCount = replyCount + 1 where articleId = #{articleid}
mapper.select: select upvoteCount from bbs_article_table where articleId = #{articleid}
select replyCount from bbs_article_table where articleId = #{articleid}
mapper.update: update bbs_article_table set isReport = 1 where articleId = #{articleid}
